start.text: Civilian, this is an active military zone. You need to leave. Now.

choices.text: I have supplies for the army.

neutral_response.text: Good. We don't need any casualties.

hostile_response.text: That's a direct order, civilian. You are now considered a hostile.

positive_response.text: Supplies? Hand them over. We'll put them to good use. Now clear the area.
